sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger➛Scheduled appointments Record➛Patient name➛First name,

Your medical appointmen has been planned on Trigger➛Scheduled appointments Record➛Appointment date, at Trigger➛Scheduled appointments Record➛Appointment time.

Doctor Trigger➛Scheduled appointments Record➛Doctor name will be waiting for You in our medical facility: Trigger➛Scheduled appointments Record➛City, Trigger➛Scheduled appointments Record➛Address.


In case of any quiesions or problems contact us: 123 456 789
Medical Appointment team
